translation.en: Fuck.
-Hi. -[Ruth] Liv, where are you?
-I just got your email. -[Liv] I'm fine.
I just have to go out of town for a couple of days.
translation.de: Ich muss nur ein paar Tage weg.

translation.en: [Ruth] Out of town? Is everything--
Everything's in the email I sent. I know it's a lot.
translation.de: Das steht alles in der E-Mail.

translation.en: I just don't want any surprises. I'll try to check in when I can.
translation.de: Ich will keine Überraschungen. Ich melde mich.

translation.en: I just don't know what service is gonna be like.
translation.de: Ich weiß nicht, ob ich Empfang habe.

translation.en: [Ruth] Sure. Should I loop Danny in?
translation.de: Klar. Soll ich Danny Bescheid geben?

translation.en: This is Danny.
He just came over with the merger.
translation.de: Er ist wegen der Fusion hier.

translation.en: Hi.
Um… nice to meet you.
Yeah. Why… why wouldn't you?
[Ruth] He's just asking if you still want him on this.
translation.de: Er fragt sich nur, ob du ihn noch dabeihaben willst.

translation.en: He's a great lawyer, of course, I do.
translation.de: Natürlich. Er ist ein toller Anwalt.

translation.en: Anyway, it's not my call.
translation.de: Es ist ohnehin nicht meine Entscheidung.

translation.en: -[Ruth] Liv, are you sure you're okay? -I'm fine.
translation.de: -Liv, echt alles in Ordnung? -Mir geht's gut.

translation.en: Let's circle back on prep strategy once I'm back in the office.
translation.de: Wenn ich zurück bin, bereiten wir uns vor.

translation.en: I've just never known you to take time off--
Ruth, I'm fine. I really have to go. Um,
translation.de: Ruth, mir geht es gut. Ich muss wirklich los.

translation.en: -text me if you need anything, okay? Bye. -[Ruth] Liv…
-[staff] Olivia Rivera? -[Liv] Yeah.
[staff] You're the 1:10 trip to Inuvik, right?
Yes. My plane was supposed to leave like an hour ago?
translation.de: Ja. Das sollte schon vor einer Stunde sein.

translation.en: Yeah, sorry about that.
It looks like wind's pretty bad up in Outer Rapids today.
translation.de: In den Outer Rapids ist es heute sehr windig.

translation.en: Your plane's stuck there, so, you're kind of SOL, unfortunately.
translation.de: Ihr Flieger steckt dort fest. Sie haben leider Pech.

translation.en: We can try to get you on something tomorrow maybe?
What? No! No, no, no. I-- I took two flights to get here from New York.
translation.de: Was? Nein. Ich musste schon von New York hierher einmal umsteigen.

translation.en: I have to get to Inuvik today.
I'm… I'm trying to meet someone before they leave again.
translation.de: Ich muss jemanden treffen, bevor derjenige wieder abreist.

translation.en: -Maybe you can call them? -[Liv] No, I…
She… she doesn't know I'm coming.
translation.de: Sie weiß nicht, dass ich komme.

translation.en: Maybe you should tell her.
translation.de: Vielleicht sollten Sie es ihr sagen.

translation.en: Can you get me on a plane or not?
translation.de: Können Sie mich hinbringen oder nicht?

translation.en: I'm sorry, miss, but I can't help you today.
translation.de: Tut mir leid, aber heute kann ich nichts für Sie tun.

translation.en: [exhales] You look just like me when I was your age.
translation.de: Du siehst aus wie ich, als ich in dem Alter war.

translation.en: [in Spanish] I'm able to know that.
[George in English] Where are we going this time?
[Sam] Top of the Mackenzie River.
[George] Jesus. That's past Inuvik.
translation.de: Mann. Das ist ja noch weiter als Inuvik.

translation.en: Where are they gonna send us next, the North Pole?
translation.de: Wo geht es als Nächstes hin, zum Nordpol?

translation.en: -Excuse me. -[PA system beeps] -Sorry. Excuse me? -[voice over PA] Flight 899…
translation.de: Entschuldigen Sie. Tut mir leid. Entschuldigen Sie.

translation.en: Excuse me! Sorry. Hi.
Did you say you're going to Inuvik?
translation.de: Sagten Sie, Sie fliegen nach Inuvik?

translation.en: Uh… past Inuvik, yeah.
This is gonna sound crazy,
but, is there any way you guys could take me with you?
translation.de: aber könnten Sie beide mich vielleicht mitnehmen?

translation.en: Crazy for who? You don't even know us.
translation.de: Verrückt? Sie kennen uns doch gar nicht.

translation.en: Look, I'm small, I have this one bag. I promise I'll be quiet.
translation.de: Ich bin dünn, habe nur einen Koffer und verhalte mich ruhig.

translation.en: Quiet's not really an option on a Cessna 208.
I just, I really need to get to Inuvik today.
translation.de: Ich muss wirklich heute noch nach Inuvik.

translation.en: And it looks like my plane is stuck somewhere and--
-I'm sorry, we'd love to help you out. -[Liv] Then help me out.
translation.de: -Wir würden Ihnen gerne helfen. -Dann helfen Sie mir.

translation.en: -Please. -If it was just me?
You know, but we're doing this for work.
translation.de: Aber das ist für die Arbeit.

translation.en: Somebody else is picking up the tab and then if something happens,
translation.de: Jemand anders bezahlt, und wenn etwas passiert,

translation.en: I think they may be liable for--
No, they wouldn't. That's not…
translation.de: Nein, stimmt nicht. Das ist nicht…

translation.en: I'm a lawyer. That's not a thing.
translation.de: Ich bin Anwältin. So ist das nicht.

translation.en: I'm sorry. Good luck.
I'll give you a thousand dollars.
Each. I'll give you each a thousand dollars.
translation.de: Pro Person. Ich gebe jedem von Ihnen 1.000 Dollar.

translation.en: Look, you guys do Venmo? I can-- I can send it to you right now.
translation.de: Haben Sie Venmo? Ich schicke es Ihnen sofort.

translation.en: Look, I feel for you. We just can't do it.
translation.de: Ich verstehe Sie. Aber es geht nicht.

translation.en: I just want to sit on your plane.
translation.de: Ich will nur in Ihrem Flugzeug sitzen.

translation.en: I just want to sit on your plane
and travel in the direction that you're already flying.
translation.de: in die Richtung, in die Sie ohnehin fliegen.

translation.en: -That's it. I just-- -Okay! Okay.
-[security] Everything all right here? -Yes.
Thank you. We're, we're just figuring out who gets the window seat.
translation.de: Danke. Wir müssen nur klären, wer am Fenster sitzen darf.

translation.en: Seriously?
Yeah.
-Sure. We'll get you to Inuvik. -[George sighs]
translation.de: Klar. Wir bringen Sie nach Inuvik.

translation.en: Oh, my God, thank you. I'm Liv, by the way.
translation.de: Oh, danke. Übrigens, ich heiße Liv.

translation.en: -Sam. -[Liv] Sam.
This is George, pilot ordinaire.
[in loud voice] Just souping her up. Sam likes to go fast.
translation.de: Ich frisiere den Motor. Sam fliegt gerne schnell.

translation.en: All good?
All good.
You're a nervous flier?
[in unamplified voice] I'm a nervous crasher.
-I said no, I'm a nervous crasher. -[chuckles]
translation.de: Ich sagte, nein, abstürzen macht mich nervös.

translation.en: -[rattling] -Is this normal?
Late summer air, mixtures of hot and cold, makes for a rough ride.
translation.de: Spätsommer, Mischung aus warm und kalt, das rüttelt einen durch.

translation.en: [George] Hey. Hey, no cell phone. You'll mess with the instruments.
translation.de: Kein Handy. Das stört die Instrumente.

translation.en: -Seriously? That's a real thing. -[Sam] Uh, it's fine.
George just doesn't trust anything without a rotary dial.
translation.de: George mag nichts, was keine Wählscheibe hat.

translation.en: Isn't there like smoother air higher up or something?
translation.de: Ist es weiter oben nicht ruhiger?

translation.en: Do you have other thoughts? How's my tracking?
translation.de: Sonst noch Vorschläge? Stimmt der Kurs?

translation.en: -I'm sorry. I'm just-- -[Sam] Don't worry.
George knows what he's doing. [George] If I didn't, I wouldn't tell you.
translation.de: -George kann das. -Und wenn nicht, würde ich nichts sagen.

translation.en: Hey, you want a drink?
Might help calm your nerves.
-No, I'm good. -[Sam] You sure?
You want a Power Bar, bottle of water?
Cocktail, New York Times?
-I'm not really a Power Bar person. -You ever been to Inuvik?
translation.de: -Ich mag keine Müslistangen. -Waren Sie schon mal in Inuvik?

translation.en: There's not gonna be much open by the time we land. Take them.
translation.de: Wenn wir landen, ist fast alles geschlossen. Nehmen Sie.

translation.en: Thanks.
So, uh, what… takes you to the northwest territories?
translation.de: Was führt Sie in die Nordwest-Territorien?

translation.en: I'm shooting the caribou run.
Uh, not shoot. "Shoot."
I'm a photographer for National Geographic.
translation.de: Ich bin Fotograf für National Geographic.

translation.en: Wow, your job's so much cooler than mine.
translation.de: Wow, Ihr Job ist deutlich cooler als meiner.

translation.en: Well, I don't know about that. What kind of law do you practice?
translation.de: Ach, ich weiß nicht. Was ist Ihr Fachgebiet als Anwältin?

translation.en: I'm a securities litigator.
You're right. My job is cooler.
translation.de: Sie haben recht. Mein Job ist cooler.

translation.en: Caribou run this late? I thought that was a spring thing.
translation.de: Ziehen die Karibus jetzt noch? Ich dachte, das wäre im Frühjahr.

translation.en: Hey, you got to go somewhere to come back, right?
I just go where they tell me.
translation.de: Ich gehe hin, wo man mich hinschickt.

translation.en: I'll be sitting in a camouflage tent with a thermos full of coffee
translation.de: Ich werde in einem Tarnzelt sitzen, mit einer Kanne Kaffee

translation.en: and about 8,000 cameras,
waiting for anything with antlers to run by.
translation.de: Ich warte, bis etwas mit Geweih vorbeiläuft.

translation.en: That sounds nice.
It does, doesn't it?
And what about you?
What brings a securities litigator this far north?
translation.de: Was führt eine Wertpapier-Anwältin in den Norden?

translation.en: Um, just… boring lawyer stuff.
Uh, it seemed like more of an emergency back at the airport.
translation.de: Nur so langweiliger Anwaltskram. Am Flughafen klang es eher nach einem Notfall.

translation.en: I'm gonna take a nap.
Uh, I'm sorry. I wasn't trying--
translation.de: Tut mir leid, ich wollte nicht…

translation.en: No, it's fine. it's just I'm-- I'm tired. Took me forever to get in from…
translation.de: Nein, schon gut. Ich bin nur müde. Es war eine lange Reise von…

translation.en: -I'm just… tired. -[Sam] All right.
We'll try to keep it down for you.
[woman speaks in a calm voice] Close your eyes.
Ensure you're resting in a comfortable position.
translation.de: Achte darauf, dass du es bequem hast.

translation.en: Inhale and exhale slowly,
in through the nose and out through the mouth.
translation.de: Durch die Nase einatmen, durch den Mund ausatmen.

translation.en: Focus on tensing and relaxing each part of your body.
translation.de: Konzentriere dich darauf, jedes Körperteil anzuspannen und zu entspannen.

translation.en: Allow all thoughts to fall away.
You are only your body.
You are only your breath.
[Ruth] Hey, you made it.
-Hi. -[Liv] Hi. Of course, I made it.
You said you were having a crisis?
translation.de: Du hast gesagt, ihr habt eine Krise?

translation.en: Yeah, the crisis was that you never come out to these things.
translation.de: Die Krise ist, dass du nie mitkommst.

translation.en: -Ruth, I have work to do. -[Ruth] No, Liv, no.
translation.de: -Ruth, ich habe zu tun. -Nein, Liv, nein.

translation.en: -No. Come on. -[Ruth] We have all have work to do,
translation.de: -Ruth, ich habe zu tun. -Nein, Liv, nein. Wir haben alle zu tun, aber nimm die hier.

translation.en: but right now take this…
translation.de: Wir haben alle zu tun, aber nimm die hier.

translation.en: -[Liv] No. -…your work is beating Danny at darts.
translation.de: -Nein. -Dein Job ist, Danny in Darts zu schlagen.

translation.en: -[stammers] -[Ruth] We're down a player. Yes, yes.
-Go. No, it's fine just go. It's great. -[Liv] Are you fucking…
translation.de: -Geh. Nein. Es ist in Ordnung. -Verdammt, du…

translation.en: -[Ruth chuckles] -Hey.
I think I just got tricked.
Why? You thought it was a shuffleboard tournament?
translation.de: Warum? Dachtest du, wir spielen Shuffleboard?

translation.en: I can't stay long.
Okay. Am I ready for this?
I hear you're a shark. I've never played before.
translation.de: -Du sollst ein Ass sein. -Ich habe noch nie gespielt.

translation.en: That's exactly what a shark would say.
translation.de: Genau das würde ein Ass sagen.

translation.en: Is Ruth trying to set us up?
Yeah, I think she is.
translation.de: Ja, ich glaube, das will sie.

translation.en: Is that appropriate?
-No, it isn't. -[Danny] Right.
That's what I… Okay.
Although, I guess, technically, we're not at work.
translation.de: Obwohl wir strenggenommen nicht bei der Arbeit sind.

translation.en: Right. Bit of a gray area.
-Why are we flying so low? -[alarm blares]
-[alarm beeps] -No, shit I got nothing!
-Whoa, buddy! We're going down! -There's no pressure and fuel!
translation.de: Mann! Wir stürzen ab! Null Treibstoff!

translation.en: Put on your seatbelt.
Oh, my God.
[Sam] Help. Help! George. George, help me out.
-[Sam] Right here. -[Liv] Yeah.
[Liv] Are you okay? [gasping, pants] I can't swim. [heavy breathing] I can't swim.
-Do you have, uh, life preservers? -[whimpers]
-Sam! Sam, do you have life preservers? -[George groaning]
Flotation devices, something? -No. I don't know. I'll check. -[George grunting]
translation.de: -Schwimmhilfen? Irgendwas? -Nein. Ich weiß nicht. Muss nachsehen.

translation.en: My leg is stuck!
Guys, we got to get out of here! I mean, this thing's gonna sink!
translation.de: Leute, wir müssen hier raus! Das Ding wird sinken!

translation.en: Sam, I'm gonna need your help. Sam?
What are you doing? Sam? No!
-No, just stop, that hurts! -I know it hurts,
translation.de: -Aufhören, das tut weh! -Ich weiß, dass es wehtut,

translation.en: -but we've gotta get you out of here. -Okay.
Hold your breath.
Please. Don't leave me.
translation.de: Bitte. Lassen Sie mich nicht allein.

translation.en: [Sam] Liv!
Help!
Kick your legs!
-Just kick your legs! -[Sam] Help!
-Help me! -Use your legs, Sam.
-It's okay, Sam. -Please, help me.
-Help me! -Hey!
[Sam] Help me!
Sam, look at me! Stop!
translation.de: Sam, sieh mich an! Hör auf!

translation.en: I need you to stop or we'll both drown, okay?
translation.de: Du musst aufhören, oder wir ertrinken beide.

translation.en: -[pants] -Stop, look I got you.
Kick your legs, -I'll take us both in, okay? -Uh-huh.
translation.de: Strample mit den Beinen. Ich bringe uns an Land.

translation.en: -Okay. -[panting]
-You got me? -I got you.
[Liv in a weak voice] Oh, Sam.
We made it.
We're good.
Hey. Hey, Sam, wake up.
Oh, shit.
-Sorry, no, I'm sorry. I'm sorry. -No!
translation.de: -Tut mir leid, nein, tut mir leid. -Nein!

translation.en: You just have this metal thing in your leg,
translation.de: Du hast ein Metallteil im Bein.

translation.en: -I'm trying to take it out. -No! No, no, no, no, no, I'll bleed out.
translation.de: -Ich ziehe es raus. -Nein, dann verblute ich.

translation.en: It's pretty bad.
A tourniquet.
You have to make a tourniquet.
Okay.
-[Sam] My belt, use my belt. -Yeah.
Okay. It's okay. I got it. I got it.
Wrap it round.
-[groans, grunts] -I'm sorry. I'm so sorry.
translation.de: Tut mir leid. Es tut mir so leid.

translation.en: [Liv] I can't get it tight enough.
translation.de: Ich kriege ihn nicht eng genug.

translation.en: Sam, how do I make it tighter?
translation.de: Sam, wie mache ich ihn enger?

translation.en: Okay, I think I got it.
Oh, thank God it stopped.
Shit, how do I keep this tight?
translation.de: Shit, wie kriege ich hin, dass es nicht aufgeht?

translation.en: Fuck!
Stay with me, Sam. Please.
Okay.
It stopped.
Sam… Sam, it stopped.
Shit.
I'm sorry, Sam.
Sam… [pants] I'm not leaving.
I'm just gonna go try and get higher to see if I can get service, okay?
translation.de: Ich gehe nur weiter rauf und versuche, Empfang zu kriegen, ok?

translation.en: I'll be right back.
[whispers] It's okay, it's gonna be okay.
One bar. Just one bar. Stupid trees.
translation.de: Ein Balken. Nur ein Balken. Blöde Bäume.

translation.en: [in normal voice] Really? Fuck.
[screams] Fuck!
Hello?
Help!
Is anybody out there?
Come on.
Are you kidding me?
Come… [sighs]
[in a strained voice] Come on, are you fucking kidding me?
translation.de: Komm schon, willst du mich verarschen?

translation.en: Okay. Well, I didn't see you helping.
translation.de: Gut. Na, du hast nicht geholfen.

translation.en: We'll figure out something better tomorrow.
translation.de: Wir überlegen uns morgen etwas Besseres.

translation.en: Night, Sam.
-[Sam groans] -Sam. Sam.
-Hey, it's Liv. -[grunts]
-Oh, it hurts. -I know, don't try to move. It's your leg.
translation.de: -Es tut weh. -Ich weiß, nicht bewegen. Dein Bein.

translation.en: No, my stomach. [groans] It fucking hurts.
translation.de: Nein, mein Bauch. Es tut verdammt weh.

translation.en: -Make it stop. -Okay. Wait, hold on. Let me see.
Oh, God. Shit.
Where's the plane?
It's… it's gone.
We crashed.
-What? Where? -[Liv] I don't know.
Where's George?
We're-- we're just gonna have to wait for them to find us.
translation.de: Wir müssen warten, bis sie uns finden.

translation.en: We're gonna sit tight and we're gonna, we're gonna stay right here--
No, they're not coming.
Of course, they are.
George logged a flight plan.
When you don't show up, your company's gonna send--
No, they're not.
Where are the bags?
-Where-- where are the bags? -Sam, National Geographic's not just…
translation.de: -Wo sind die Taschen? -Sam, National Geographic wird nicht…

translation.en: When you don't show up, they're gonna send someone.
I'm not a photographer.
No one's coming. No one knows we're here.
translation.de: Niemand kommt. Niemand weiß, dass wir hier sind.

translation.en: You're on your own.
